item.title: macOS
item.description: Run AppleScript from command line osascript -e 'choose color' Ref Standalone color picker https://www.addictivetips.com/mac-os/use-the-color-picker-in-macos-as-a-stand-alone-app/ Create an App from a shell script https://mathiasbynens.be/notes/shell-script-mac-apps
